articles.title: Fishy Red Sox Data Raises Questions About Rays' Pitcher's Mound - NESN.com
articles.description: Questions over the Tropicana Field mound have emerged ahead of the Red Sox-Rays American League Division Series.

articles.title: Less restrictive 'bioburden' rules would make some Mars missions simpler - Phys.org
articles.description: A new report that could make it simpler to send spacecraft to some areas of Mars while still protecting the planet from Earth-based contamination was presented today at a press conference at the 53rd annual meeting of the American Astronomical Society's Divis…

articles.title: Indian-American astronaut part of NASA-SpaceX Crew-3 mission - India TV News
articles.description: The four astronauts will lift off to space on October 30 from Launch Complex 39A at NASA's Kennedy Space Center in Florida, the statement added.
